w = input().replace('Sh', '!')
w = w.replace('sh', '@')
w = w.replace('sH', '#')
w = w.replace('SH', '%')
w = w.replace('ch', '+')
w = w.replace('Ch', '-')
w = w.replace('cH', '*')
w = w.replace('CH', '/')
w = w.replace('ng', '^')
w = w.replace('Ng', '&')
w = w.replace('nG', '(')
w = w.replace('NG', ')')

w = w[::-1]
w = w.replace('!', 'Sh')
w = w.replace('@', 'sh')
w = w.replace('#', 'sH')
w = w.replace('%', 'SH')
w = w.replace('+', 'ch')
w = w.replace('-', 'Ch')
w = w.replace('*', 'cH')
w = w.replace('/', 'CH')
w = w.replace('^', 'ng')
w = w.replace('&', 'Ng')
w = w.replace('(', 'nG')
w = w.replace(')', 'NG')
print(w)
